JoystickHandler Class Reference

#include <JoystickHandler.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The joystick input handler handles input events produced by a joystick (or game pad) connected to this computer.

The update method is called by the input manager, and the input handler increases events by calling the input manager's increaseEventQuantity method.

Author:
Thomas Jacob
